name: Puddlegulp
text: Worthy — Action: Find Frogjolnir and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: “For too long, we have been underestimated and seen as trifling and insignificant, my friends. Cute beasts playing pretend champions. But we are true heroes.”

name: Throg
text: [star] Froglike Stamina — Response: After Throg uses a basic power, return Frogjolnir to your hand → ready Throg. (Limit once per phase.) “There is justice to be done, so let us hop to it!”

name: Airborne Amphibian
text: Hero Action: Ready Throg and Frogjolnir. You may choose a minion engaged with another player and engage it to draw 1 card. "Back, vile fiend! Throg the Thunder Frog defends these lands!" —Throg

name: Great Courage
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Engage any number of minions in play. For each minion engaged with you (to a maximum of 3), remove 2 threat from a scheme. "Though my size is small, my courage is not!" —Throg

name: Hammer Throw
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Frogjolnir and return it to your hand → deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill. "I have no more words for thee, villain. So now we let Frogjolnir do the talking." —Throg

name: Lightning Leap
text: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack against a minion engaged with a player, resolve that attack against the villain and each minion engaged with that player instead, ignoring the guard keyword. "Have at thee! And at thee! And thee!" —Throg

name: Thunderous Charge
text: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic thwart against a scheme, resolve that thwart against each scheme in play instead, ignoring the crisis icon (in the order of your choice, including any bonuses to your THW for that thwart). "Fear not my friends, I will save you!" —Throg

name: Foreverglade
text: Alter-Ego Response: After you make a basic recovery, exhaust Foreverglade → ready Puddlegulp and draw 1 card. A kingdom in the marshland of Midgard where the razor-sharp songs of the cicadas melt against the bellowing of the toads and sing of glory.

name: Frog of Thunder
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Frog of Thunder → generate a [energy] resource. If you paid for a Throg card this way, deal 1 damage to an enemy. “I am the Frog of Thunder. The very skies must tremble when croaks the Mighty Throg!” —Throg

name: Frogjolnir
text: Restricted. Throg gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When Throg uses a basic power, exhaust Frogjolnir → Throg gets +1 to that power for this use. “EMBIGGEN!” —Ms. Marvel

name: Throg's Armor
text: You get +2 hit points. Hero Response: After you engage a minion, give Throg a tough status card. If you cannot, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.) “Have at thee, scoundrel!” —Throg
